title: Ramazan : Sri Lankan Muslims will celebrate Eid on 3rd May
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Muslims will be celebrating the Eid Ul Fitr festival on Tuesday the 3rd of May 2022, announced the Department of Muslim Religious & Cultural Affairs, All Ceylon Jamiyyathul Ulama, and the Colombo Grand Mosque.
TN BJP Leader requests not to ‘politicize’ Sri Lanka aid package
